channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-15989] Synchronized at CompositeService#removeService is not required
item.description:
Synchronization at CompositeService#removeService method level is not required.

protected synchronized boolean removeService(Service service) {
synchronized (serviceList) {
return serviceList.remove(service);
}
}
item.summary: Synchronized at CompositeService#removeService is not required

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
